entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -37.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 03:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -37.6°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -41.4°C
Wind: SW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
